title: Game loads, unable to use Abilities and keybinds
body:
This problem has been persisting for months and there has been no fix for it. I load into the game and am unable to use my ability keybinds (QWERBF).  It can happen on my first game after loading or the 5th game.  There is no way to duplicate when it happens but it continues to happen nonetheless.  When it does occur I ctrl+alt+del for task manager and sometimes that fixes it in game, but other times it does not.

Can someone please fix this issue?

replies.body: I basically have the same problem, I've had this issues for several months now. However I cant ctrl+alt+del to task manager, I have to completely exit the game and client and then load back in. Have you found a fix for it yet or do you still have your problem?

It sounds like your config files could be corrupt, so it can fail to respond to you inputs properly.  Try a config reset and test it in a custom to fix that up.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps!
It does not help.  I clear it out, play anywhere from 2-6 games fine then it happens again.  Have not closed LoL.

Twitch has probably been meddling with your mouse or keyboard. [Pest Control will help you get rid of him.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues)
